amendment.description: To repeal the authorizations for use of military force against Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3337 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3337 proposed by Senator Young for Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 3748. To repeal the authorizations for use of military force against Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3337 proposed by Senator Young for Senator Kaine to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3337 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
